headline: What Donald Trump Didnt Count On in Georgia
sentences: And it is his gift for both reflecting and rewarding his conservative Georgia constituency that has given him a surprisingly cushy lead in the polls in advance of Tuesdays Republican primary, even as Mr. Trump, who remains tremendously popular in Georgia, continues to disparage him as a Republican in name only? and demands that voters punish Mr. Kemp for declining to help him overturn the states presidential election results of November 2020.
